title: Welcome to the Community Forum
content: This is a great place to ask questions and get help from the community. Please read the rules before posting.

title: Troubleshooting Common Issues
content: If you're facing issues, first check our troubleshooting guide. It covers most common problems and their solutions.

title: How to post a question
content: To post a new question, navigate to the 'New Topic' section and describe your problem clearly. Include screenshots if possible.

title: Understanding API Endpoints
content: API endpoints are specific URLs that represent different functions or data resources available through an API.

title: User Authentication Methods
content: Different authentication methods like OAuth, API keys, and JWT tokens are used to secure API access.

title: Database Schema Design Best Practices
content: Designing an efficient database schema involves normalization, indexing, and choosing appropriate data types.

title: Virtual Assistant Limitations
content: Our virtual assistant can provide information based on predefined knowledge bases. It cannot perform actions outside its scope.
